content: hot cuppa coasters with double knitting tutorial chana tyman-levy eclecticitee designs a quick gift and a great introduction to double knitting if you already know this technique use the chart and have fun if you are new to double knitting there is a one-page tutorial to guide you through making these useful coasters yarn total about 20 grams 34 meters / 37 2 yards of aran weight cotton yarn two colors that contrast well 10 grams each the example was knit with bbb filati bali needle size 4 mm us 6 gauge 17 st / 22 row in stockinette 10cm/4 in not terribly important for coasters but still useful information notions tapestry needle for weaving in ends pattern notes the shaded numbers in the chart and the stitch count table mark the leading color for that side you are free to use whatever selvedge edge s you prefer for double knitting for this pattern to achieve the double stranded border i slipped the first pair together knitwise and purled the last pair together holding both color strands cast on 21 knit through chart once bind off s s s 25 n g 24 s s is e s s 23 d e 22 s s e t s s 21 ic it 20 s s c e s s 19 lc e 18 s s s r 16 s s s s s s 1 1 7 5 e t 14 s s s a o s s 13 c 12 s s a s s 11 p p 10 s s u c s s 9 t o 8 s s h s s 7 6 s s s s 5 4 s s s s 3 2 s s s s 1 and for those who really hate to work with charts here are the stitch counts written out row 1 2 p decrease row 15 sl 1 decrease kw 2 2 11 2 2
